biocontainers.name: ncoils
biocontainers.summary: Program that compares a sequence to a database of known parallel two-stranded coiled-coils and derives a similarity score. by comparing this score to the distribution of scores in globular and coiled-coil proteins, the program then calculates the probability that the sequence will adopt a coiled-coil conformation.

biotools.summary: Prediction of coiled-coil secondary structure elements.

bioschemas.name: ncoils
bioschemas.summary: Prediction of coiled-coil secondary structure elements.
